H0.text: Name the space craft that exploded 72 seconds after lift off killing all 7 crew members in 1986.. Challenger

H1.text: Name the space craft that exploded 72 seconds after lift off killing all 7 crew members in 1986.. Columbia

H2.text: Name the space craft that exploded 72 seconds after lift off killing all 7 crew members in 1986.. Apollo 1

H3.text: Name the space craft that exploded 72 seconds after lift off killing all 7 crew members in 1986.. OV-99

A4.text: On its tenth flight in January 1986, Challenger broke up 73 seconds after liftoff, killing the seven-member crew of STS-51-L.

A5.text: Challenger was the first Space Shuttle to be destroyed in a mission disaster.
